title: Structure Your Performance Review
description: Sort collected feedback into a well-organized performance review
prompt:
Create a web app that will take feedback and sort it into custom performance dimensions to populate a performance evaluation. The app should:
- Allow users to define their review dimensions (e.g., Leadership, Technical Skills, Innovation)
- Accept feedback text through input or file upload
- Sort feedback into the defined dimensions
- Export the organized feedback for performance reviews
example:
User defines dimensions like 'Technical Skills', 'Teamwork', 'Innovation'
Inputs feedback: 'Led the migration to cloud services'
App categorizes it under appropriate dimension
Exports organized feedback for review
author: GooseAI Team

dimensions.description: List of performance dimensions to sort feedback into

feedback_input.description: Text or file containing feedback to sort
